plot: If you could never look into someone else's eyes for fear of what you might see, could you ever truly know or love another person... would you want to.
title: In Deep Sight
plot_es: If you could never look into someone else's eyes for fear of what you might see, could you ever truly know or love another person... would you want to.
plot_en: If you could never look into someone else's eyes for fear of what you might see, could you ever truly know or love another person... would you want to.
